website_summaries.verdict: A powerful, affordable, and convenient washer by a trusted brand. If you need a compact model with somewhat more interior space, this is one to consider.
pros: A compact washer by Magic Chef that features a bit more space than smaller models thanks to its capacity of two cubic feet
Yet it still has a small footprint
Easy to maneuver, as it has rollers on the bottom of the machine
cons: If you need a machine for large loads, it's probably not practical

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably efficient quiet and cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and has many options. I use the quick cycle. Clothes are clean and minimally damp!! Great Spin!!! My clothes come out ready to hang dry. Towels dry very quick...don’t have to use dryer...love it. Perfect size for mom with child or Couple!!! Not too big not too small. You can see and feel the quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moonpie

customer_reviews.title: No hot wash
customer_reviews.text: Washer has hot and cold hookups, however it is not designed to wash with hot water. Customer support told me that the valve for the hot water like only opens for a few seconds no matter whether hot or warm wash is selected. Other than that it seems to work fine for small loads.
customer_reviews.author: Polyskill Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Click here it’s a great washer here
customer_reviews.text: Well I just got this washer in the mail not to long ago and I’m going to say this is a good portable washer for it size it really has a great washer spin I will show you a clip of my clothes washing but if you’re staying in a one bedroom apartment like me it’s a great deal and plus I kinda gotta a discount on mines so I love it an it does has a great dry spin my clothes was really like dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rashawn hill

customer_reviews.title: Defective control card?
customer_reviews.text: No water on rinse cycle when in "NORMAL" setting. All other settins work great. Holds more laundry than I thought. Probably needs new control card. How do I get this done????
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Laundry at home
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and good, not more laundry outside for me , I will buy with dryer but is not so necessary the clothes are almost dry
customer_reviews.author: pao

customer_reviews.title: love my washer
customer_reviews.text: I love my washer. 2.0 can load enough clothes. And it spin dries well. Very quiet... my kitchen and living room is close, I can be in my living room and never notice when its done. Most washer are loud. You can't hear it in the hallway. I would suggest get an drain hose extension i had to modify mine attaching 1 inch pipe about 7inch long, along with thick rubber hose to fit the drain extension. So it can reach the sink being across the kitchen so I don't have to move. Its optional. You don't have too. Other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: S.Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that it came with a little dent on the left side, but as it is in the garage I will let it slip. We installed it today and worked fine which I was happy about because of the dent. The very small wheels on the back are almost useless. It was easy to install and will update this review pending usage. Would have given it a higher rating except for dent and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good quality good products working amazing very happy with this for a little washer machine Can wash a Queen size comforter by it self with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Galati

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: The machine is great, I was so excited to start using it i was starting to have a panic attack. I did a lg., load it took 44 min., I was amazed at how strong the spin cycle is I hung my tops on hangers in 4hrs., time my tops were dry and they smelled clean. No more laundry mat yuk. Do my laundry at my leisure this is definitely one fantastic strong machine. Instructions were easy to follow hooked it up to my kitchen sink. I'm going to be a 70 yr.old senior soon this was my birthday present to me. Thank you magic chef and Amazon. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this machine Seriously 😃👍
customer_reviews.author: Donna worrilow

customer_reviews.title: Awsome product amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this easy to use but to move it around easier i coukd gett the magic cheff dolly
customer_reviews.author: Amber Swan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent washer
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to move so I ordered a dolly roller that locks down. Now I am very pleased ,it is easy to move and washes a larger load than expected. The final spin does an excellent job and make drying time less.
customer_reviews.author: Flajunebug13

customer_reviews.title: Awesome washer!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Magic Chef washer. I have animals and live in an Rv and it cleans so great. I can get a good size load in and can also wash one comforter at a time. I may get a bigger one someday but will never go back to a regular washer again.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kiefel

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed by this  small washer.
customer_reviews.text: This little washing machine is very efficient. Washes a good size load. No complaints, I would definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Zimmering

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review about the dryer and thought it was about the washer and dryer....so l would repeat what.l said concerning the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine will leak
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like to empty the catch basin otherwise machine will leak. Didn't stay quiet like it did the first few washes.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Compact,easy to use and quiet. Perfect for our travel trailer. Only thing that is missing for convenience is a liquid softner dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: 🥰 I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s quiet. Whirlpool wash format. Moving is a little difficult even with it having wheels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great mini washer.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have purchased this machine a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from Walmart but just had to leave a review. I received an intact product with no dents or damages and this review is based on that premise. The video says it all. Wash is impeccably clean, manual is very useful and easy to read. Set up is straight forward. The 2 cycle spin does and excellent job! Altogether, I’m very pleased with this washing machine. I’m withholding one star just because I haven’t used for long, but so far I have a 5 star experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Magic Chef 2.0 Cu. Ft. Compact Top-Load Washer
product_meta.description: For small loads and limited space, the Magic Chef compact top-load washer is a lifesaver. Equipped with a variety of convenience features, it includes a see-through window, electronic controls with LED display, stainless steel inner tub, detergent dispenser and two water inlets. Boasting the same durable construction of larger models, our portable washer makes any laundry day a breeze by delivering full-size results. Perfect for anywhere you need to save space, it makes a great compact choice for apartments and vacation homes.
feature_bullets: Easily accessible control panel provides convenient access to wash options
6 fully automatic wash cycles provide optimal care for a variety of fabrics
Rollers make it easy to move the washer
3 water level & 3 temperature settings ensure clothes are washed properly
Pulsator generates strong & weak water flows for an even wash
Auto shutoff after the cycle end signal for added convenience

specifications.Cover Included: Washer with electrical cord, 2 water supply hoses, quick connection adapter, water intake cap, bottom cover, manual, warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars53 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
